name: Githzerai Monk
lore: Githzerai monks live in fortified monasteries on the plane of Limbo, using their psionic focus and iron discipline to impose order on the swirling chaos around them. They hone body and mind into living weapons, channeling psychic energy through their unarmed strikes. Githzerai monasteries are led by powerful zerths and guided by the teachings of the legendary Zerthimon, whose philosophy of self-reliance and resistance to tyranny permeates every aspect of githzerai culture.

traits.name: Mental Discipline
traits.description: The monk has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed or Frightened condition on itself.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.description: While the monk isn't wearing armor and isn't using a Shield, the monk's AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

spellcasting.name: Githzerai Psionics
spellcasting.notes: This spellcasting is a Bonus Action. The monk requires no spell components and uses Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

multiattack.description: The monk makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

bonusActions.name: Githzerai Psionics
bonusActions.description: The monk casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): Feather Fall, Jump, See Invisibility, or Shield.

reactions.name: Slow Fall
reactions.description: The monk reduces the fall's damage by 20.
